entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 9:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NW 53 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late in the evening. Local snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
